name: Crazy FPS (Packed1000)
description:
this is an FPS where you get a pistol and sniper to fight robots. your main objective is to kill all robots. if you get lucky with your kills, you might get some fun new game elements.

Controls: There's a control menu you can reach in game by pressing tab

Tip: if your stuck in a endless loop of killing the final boss, then try going around and killing all his minions! that'll get him mad and ready to fight!

Made by Paced1000

Check out my other games: https://packed1000.itch.io/
